subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Drew Brees had 308 yards passing, Pierre Thomas scored two touchdowns and Jabari Greer returned an interception for a score to help the Saints beat Atlanta and improve to 7-0.
snippet: Drew Brees had 308 yards passing, Pierre Thomas scored two touchdowns and Jabari Greer returned an interception for a score to help the Saints beat Atlanta and improve to 7-0.
